title: Trend Micro Password Manager
extract: A Basic Password Manager. Trend Micro Password Manager handles all the basics. It captures passwords as you log in, plays them back when needed, and offers a browser menu of all your saved logins. It keeps secure notes for you, and helps you fill Web forms. It even offers a secure browser for your financial sites.Sep 25, 2017
